rows.label: tlk43400441_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Hello...
How are you all doing?

rows.label: tlk43400441_03_msg0002
rows.name:
I've been using Gromrice lately to
make some dumplings to give to the
kids, just like Musubi used to do for me.

rows.label: tlk43400441_03_msg0003
rows.name:
They've turned out pretty good, so
the kids pester me every day for them.

rows.label: tlk43400441_03_msg0004
rows.name:
I'll end up looking like a dumpling at
this rate if I don't make something else.
